channel.title: Midland G 227 on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Notes on the Midland G-227 GMRS/FRS radio
item.description: Midland G-227 GMRS radio, quantity two, a gift from the Wells-Becker Motorcycle Emporium in Dexter, Michigan. I replaced batteries in both of them, they take 4xAAA. Radio 1 successfully hears static when the (M) monitor button is depresssed; Radio 2 hears nothing. A manual is at http://www.manualslib.com/manual/396326/Midland-G-225.html which describes the frequencies of the 22 channels it can transmit on. A reasonable next step is to get my NooElec SDR tuner out and see if I can monitor a transmission.
